result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Includes cases 22CM148, 22CT23, 22CF119. No driving w/o valid license. Absolute sobriety from alcohol. No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores, or Beer Tents. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (1) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening. Prints and photograph. Called:  8:39 a.m. 
INCLUDES 22CF119, 22CM148, 22CT23.

COURT recites history of motion.  
ADA Coonen makes objections to motion. 
Atty Rotter makes arguments. 
Victim makes statement.  

COURT makes findings and modifies bond which includes all cases to NO VIOLENT or ABUSIVE contact with C.O.  All other terms and conditions to remain.  

COURT continues dates previously set.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 9:20 am. 
***UNMONITORED DAR*** 
INCLUDES: 22CM148, 22CT23 & 22CF119.
BRANCH 4 CASES.

State appears by ADA Natalie Zibolski for ADA Lacey Coonen.
Defendant appears in person, pro se. 

VRCW. Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Prelim Time Limits Waived (22CF119). 

NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT (22CM148 & 22CT23).

COURT ORDERS: 
Signature Bond in the amount of $2,000.00 (to cover all files).

 CONDITIONS: 
- No driving w/o valid license.
- Absolute sobriety from alcohol.
- No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores, or Beer Tents. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within 48 hours. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (1) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening
- Prints and photograph. 
- No contact with victim(s): C.O.; Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.

DATES:
PTC: 05/16/2022 @ 1:30 pm.
PRELIM: 06/23/2022 @ 9:00 am. 

Adjourned: 9:26 am.
